modifyLocations.name: servery-food-bar
modifyLocations.description:
You're in the SQL Servery serving area.
The breakfast spread has been cleared away and things are quiet out here whilst the kitchen team prepare for lunch.

modifyLocations.name: servery-main
modifyLocations.description:
You're in the SQL Servery.
When mealtimes aren't being served you can still find people occasionally sat in here studying or chatting to one another although mostly it's just a quick throroughfare between the sales and development team areas.

attributes.detailedDescription: It's the type used in a bain-marie for keeping things like soup warm.
